title: Shopify Order
description: An order in a Shopify store

created_at.description: The date and time when the order was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the order was last modified

financial_status.description: The status of payments associated with the order

fulfillment_status.description: The order's status in terms of fulfilled line items

currency.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the shop currency

total_price.description: The total price of the order

subtotal_price.description: The price of the order before shipping and taxes

total_tax.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order

line_items.description: A list of line item objects
